entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who scoffs at Harry's concern. She is described as being irritable and sniping at Ron over their homework.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is sniping with Hermione over their homework.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as getting tired of Ron and Hermione's arguing. He takes Sirius' food to the Owlery on his own.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who owns food that Harry takes to the Owlery.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is a small owl that Harry enlists for help in carrying food to the Owlery.

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: The Forbidden Forest is mentioned as being visible from the grounds, with dark and rustling treetops.
